title.rendered: Eldorado Stone® To Exhibit New Color Offerings Inspired By Nature At 2014 Pacific Coast Builders Conference (PCBC)

content.rendered:
Long known as manufacturer of the world’s most believable architectural stone veneer, Eldorado Stone® is leading the nature-as-inspiration trend. The company will showcase its new color options and nature-inspirations for both indoors and out at the 2014 Pacific Coast Builders Conference (PCBC) in San Francisco, June 25th and 26th.

“PCBC is one of the key platforms we’re using to showcase our products to influential developers, builders, architects and designers in 2014,” notes Eldorado Stone Vice President of Sales and Marketing Brent Spann. “This year at the show, we’re highlighting our hand-crafted, architectural stone veneer in four new colors, each designed to transform ordinary spaces into memorable focal points, in a natural, beautiful and easily attainable way.”

Eldorado Stone’s four new color hues reflect tones that are both current and timeless, including:
• Madrona: A striking combination of natural and burgundy shades, this color is available in the Cut Coarse profile, a modern design resembling saw-cut Turkish limestone.
• Iron Mill & Oakmont: Rich tones of burgundies and grays comprise Iron Mill, while Oakmont features warm earth tones. Both colors are available in the acclaimed European Ledge profile, a fusion between old-world stonework and modern design.
• Barley: Warm natural tones with white-highlights signify new vibrancy for the popular Cliffstone profile, perfect for transitional and contemporary designs.

For more than five decades, PCBC has featured the leading manufacturers in the residential building, home technology and green products categories. This year, more than 300 manufacturers and suppliers will exhibit at the two-day conference.

PCBC will be held at the Moscone Center in San Francisco. The Eldorado Stone booth is #N-6509.

ABOUT ELDORADO STONE:
Eldorado Stone, LLC is headquartered in the San Diego area. It is a subsidiary of Headwaters Incorporated (NYSE: HW), a world leader in creating value through innovative advancements in the utilization of natural resources. Eldorado Stone currently operates manufacturing facilities in several states with regional distribution centers across the U.S. For more information and to view a gallery of beautiful installations, visit www.eldoradostone.com or call 1 800-925-1491 for a free catalog.
